mapper.select: SELECT TB.* FROM ( SELECT TB_1.BC_NO AS BC_NO , TB_2.BASE_PD_CD AS BASE_PD_CD , TB_3.PD_PRP_VAL01 AS USWY_DV_CD , TB_1.PDCT_PD_CD AS PDCT_PD_CD , ( CASE WHEN TB_11.SVPD_ITEM_GR = '92' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END ) AS FARM_YN , TB_11.SVPD_NM_ABBR1 AS ITEM_NM , TB_1.CNTR_NO AS CNTR_NO , TB_1.CNTR_SN AS CNTR_SN , TB_5.RCGVP_KNM AS CUST_NM , '' AS HNO_NO , TB_6.LOCARA_TNO , TB_6.EXNO_ENCR /* 복호화 */ , TB_6.IDV_TNO , '' AS CSMR_YR /* 빈값 전달 */ , '' AS CSMR_CD /* 빈값 전달 */ , TB_8.RNADR || ' ' || TB_8.RDADR AS ADDR , TB_8.NEW_ADR_ZIP AS ZIPNO , TB_9.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO AS EMP_ID , TB_7.PRTNR_KNM AS EMP_NM , TB_7.OG_NM AS DEPT_NM , '' AS MNG_HP_NO , TB_6.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO , TB_6.MEXNO_ENCR /* 복호화 */ , TB_6.CRAL_IDV_TNO , TB_9.VST_CNFMDT AS VST_DT , ( SELECT TEMP.CD_CNTN FROM T_CMZ_CD_D TEMP WHERE 1=1 AND TEMP.TENANT_ID = #{session.tenantId} AND TEMP.CD_ID = 'VST_DV_CD' AND TEMP.CD_VLD_VAL = TB_12.VST_DV_CD AND TEMP.DEL_YN = 'N' ) AS MNG_TYP , TB_2.SV_PRD || '개월' AS MNG_CYC , TB_10.BLD_NM AS DBLD_NM , ( CASE WHEN TB_11.SVPD_ITEM_KND = '5' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END ) AS FILTER_YN , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY TB_9.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD, TB_9.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO ORDER BY TB_9.VST_DUEDT DESC, TB_9.VST_EXP_HH DESC) AS RNK FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ TB_1 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL TB_2 ON ( TB_1.CNTR_NO = TB_2.CNTR_NO AND TB_1.CNTR_SN = TB_2.CNTR_SN ) INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL TB_3 ON ( TB_1.SV_PD_CD = TB_3.PD_CD AND TB_3.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PDCT' ) INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL TB_4 ON ( TB_1.CNTR_NO = TB_4.DTL_CNTR_NO AND TB_1.CNTR_SN = TB_4.DTL_CNTR_SN AND TB_4.ADRPC_TP_CD = '3' /* 2:배송지 3:설치지 */ ) INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS TB_5 ON ( TB_4.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = TB_5.CNTR_ADRPC_ID ) INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS TB_6 ON ( TB_1.MNGT_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD = TB_6.OG_TP_CD AND TB_1.MNGT_PRTNR_NO = TB_6.PRTNR_NO ) INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ TB_7 ON ( TB_7.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND TB_6.OG_TP_CD = TB_7.OG_TP_CD AND TB_6.PRTNR_NO = TB_7.PRTNR_NO ) INNER JOIN TB_GBCO_ADR_BAS TB_8 ON ( TB_5.ADR_ID = TB_8.ADR_ID ) INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ TB_9 ON ( TB_6.OG_TP_CD = TB_9.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD AND TB_6.PRTNR_NO = TB_9.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO ) INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ TB_10 ON ( TB_7.BASE_YM = TB_10.BASE_YM AND TB_7.OG_ID = TB_10.OG_ID ) INNER JOIN () TB_11 ON ( TB_1.PDCT_PD_CD = TB_11.SVPD_PD_CD ) INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ TB_12 ON ( TB_9.CNTR_NO = TB_12.CNTR_NO AND TB_9.CNTR_SN = TB_12.CNTR_SN AND TB_9.SV_BIZ_MCLSF_CD = TB_12.SV_BIZ_MCLSF_CD AND TB_9.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = TB_12.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD AND TB_9.WK_SN = TB_12.WK_SN ) WHERE 1=1 AND TB_1.BC_NO = #{qrcd} ) TB WHERE 1=1 AND TB.RNK = 1
